data.actual_result: The very first subaction is moved slightly to the left
data.expected_result: All the subactions start at the same point
data.short_description: When adding/removing a role multiple times, the first section in the entry is moved slightly to the left
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage roles and view the audit log - Add/remove a user's role multiple times - Go into the audit log and view the expanded entry
